Question
========

A random sample of 10 people, who then followed a calcium-enriched diet. Of these people, calcium levels before and after the diet was measured. What test should you use to test whether in this population, the average calcium level before the diet is equal to the average calcium level after following the diet?

Answerlist
----------

* Pooled T test
* Paired T-test
* F-test
* CRD-ANOVA

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Pooled T test: Incorrect
* Paired T-test: Correct
* F-test: Incorrect
* CRD-ANOVA: Incorrect
